li.label: ate awful sausage
li.description: I ate a mixture of raw meat with salt grains that could barely be called a sausage. Completely disgusting.

li.label: ate poor sausage
li.description: That sausage was a little humid to be completely mature, I could still feel the flavour of raw meat.

li.label: ate good sausage
li.description: I ate a nice and tasty sausage.

li.label: ate excellent sausage
li.description: That sausage was delicious. It's easy to notice it has been well aged.

li.label: ate masterwork sausage
li.description: I experienced a flavour only thought to be felt by the most refined palates!

li.label: ate legendary sausage
li.description: To be able to taste a food this delicious is something not ordinary! I'm completely pleased!
